title: Remove duplicate volume control in Pre‑Meditation setup container

requirements.summary: Remove the duplicate volume input from the specified Pre‑Meditation setup container so only one ambient-volume control remains and continues to drive the same volume state/audio behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Pre‑Meditation page UI, the selected container shows only one volume input/control (no duplicate/second volume input in the same container).
Changing the remaining volume control updates the ambient audio volume as before.
No other controls in that container (other than the duplicate volume element) are removed or functionally changed.

file_operations.description: Within the Pre‑Meditation setup view JSX, locate the UI block that corresponds to the selected container (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]) and remove the duplicate volume input/Slider so only a single volume control remains in that container. Ensure the remaining control continues to update the existing `volume` state and still drives ambient audio volume changes (including the setup preview audio via AmbientMusicCarousel and the in-session audio via `audioRef`). Keep all other controls in that container intact and functionally unchanged.
